title: Education is the manifestaion of perfection present already in man. Divinity is the manifestaion of the religion already in man.
subTitle: Swami Vivekanand

title: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
subTitle: Nelson Mandela

title: Education is not the learning of facts, but the training of the mind to think.
subTitle: Albert Einstein

title: Anyone who stops learning is old, whether at twenty or eighty.
subTitle: Henry Ford

title: The function of education is to teach one to think intensively and to think critically. Intelligence plus character that is the goal of true education.
subTitle: Dr. Martin Luther King, Jr.
